lead_paragraph: Federal supplies of bottled water, filters, replacement cartridges and test kits will continue until Aug. 14.

headline.print_headline: Michigan: Federal Aid for Flint Is Extended
headline.main: Michigan: Federal Aid for Flint Is Extended

snippet: Federal supplies of bottled water, filters, replacement cartridges and test kits will continue until Aug. 14.
abstract: Michigan Gov Rick Snyder says federal emergency declaration to help city of Flint during lead-tainted water crisis has been extended.
